title: Implement Login Flow in FastAPI App
description: Create a login page and associated routes in the FastAPI app to enable user authentication.

tasks.title: Design Login Page
tasks.description: Create a visually appealing and user-friendly login page for the FastAPI app.

tasks.title: Implement Login API Endpoint
tasks.description: Set up the backend API endpoint for user login functionality in the FastAPI app.

tasks.title: Create User Authentication Middleware
tasks.description: Develop middleware to handle user authentication and authorization for the app routes.
